welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Niagara Falls, Canada! Get ready to be enchanted by the breathtaking natural beauty of the falls and the charm of our vibrant city. We invite you to explore, enjoy, and create unforgettable memories during your visit."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport caters to private and charter flights, with its own dedicated services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Catharines Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
